message: That emotional manipulation is what really holds people to it and the ages of 12 to 14 are easily manipulated so that's what we're seeing

data.description: MYRTLE BEACH, S.C. (WBTW)- South Carolina lawmakers passed a bill making sure those who are convicted of trafficking minors spend more time behind bars. Representative Russel Fry of Surfside Beach wrote the bill, which makes sentencing run consecutively so if someone is convicted of trafficking m...
data.title: South Carolina lawmakers cracking down on human trafficking
